original_title: Spunky Double Feature: Circus Adventure / Camping Adventure
overview: Join Spunky and his friends for a double dose of fun -- and enlightening -- escapades. In Camping Adventure, Spunky and Mark learn the value of being nice to everyone when they pitch their tent next to the site of a kid named Buzz and his ill-tempered pooch. In Circus Adventure, the pals find themselves in trouble when all the animals under the big top escape, leading them on a journey filled with lessons of faith, trust and honesty.
title: Spunky Double Feature: Circus Adventure / Camping Adventure
